littlearrowshop: Jen, 86% of the time your posts are totally in line with whatever is happening in my life. I've also had body issues my entire life. Sorry if this is tmi but I started menopause at 35 and have seen a drastic decline since. Truth is I want to get in shape and tackle my ass, thighs, back, upper arms and now stomach (which was also always my confident body part) but I have no clue where to even start.
